scripts.deps:check: pnpm -w run depcheck && pnpm -w run knip
scripts.deps:validate: pnpm -w run deps:check && pnpm -w run deps:audit
scripts.check-all: pnpm -w run lint && pnpm -w run typecheck && pnpm -w run deps:check && pnpm -w run build
scripts.release:all: pnpm -w run release:runlintic && pnpm -w run release:docs && pnpm -w run release:web
scripts.release:all:patch: pnpm -w run release:runlintic:patch && pnpm -w run release:docs:patch && pnpm -w run release:web:patch
scripts.release:all:minor: pnpm -w run release:runlintic:minor && pnpm -w run release:docs:minor && pnpm -w run release:web:minor
scripts.release:all:major: pnpm -w run release:runlintic:major && pnpm -w run release:docs:major && pnpm -w run release:web:major
scripts.release:all:patch:dry: pnpm -w run release:runlintic:patch:dry && pnpm -w run release:docs:dry && pnpm -w run release:web:dry
scripts.release:all:minor:dry: pnpm -w run release:runlintic:minor:dry && pnpm -w run release:docs:dry && pnpm -w run release:web:dry
scripts.release:all:major:dry: pnpm -w run release:runlintic:major:dry && pnpm -w run release:docs:dry && pnpm -w run release:web:dry
scripts.health-check: pnpm -w run workspace:sync && pnpm -w run deps:validate && pnpm -w run check-all
